dcterms:description: The slashdot dataset is concerned about science and technology news categorization, which predicts multiple labels given article titles and partial blurbs mined from Slashdot.org.
dcterms:title: Slashdot Dataset

dcterms:description: The medical dataset involves the assignment of ICD-9-CM codes to radiology reports.
dcterms:title: Medical Dataset

dcterms:creator: Ashok N Srivastava
Brett Zane-Ulman
dcterms:description: The tmc2007 dataset is concerned about safety report categorization, labeling aviation safety reports with respect to what types of problems they describe.
dcterms:title: TMC2007 Dataset
